title: Packaging Fonts ID
tags: can anyone identify this chunky font?
content:
1 Glazy  
2. Nasscom GDC  
3. AquaFresh  
4. Pledge  
5. Lysol  
6 Mona Vie

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Packaging.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011040512/http:/typophile.com/files/Packaging.jpg) | 344.58 KB |
author: NeonPurple

comments.content:
1. Hand-drawn  
2. [NASSCOM](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011040512/http:/gamingbolt.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/nasscom1.jpg): very close to [Futura no.2 Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011040512/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/futura-no-2/); GDC (and the rest): [Nasalization](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011040512/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/nasalization/)  
3. custom logo based on a commercial typeface. Some to start with: [Formata](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011040512/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/formata-pro/), [Segoe](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011040512/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ascender/segoe-tv/), [Myriad](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011040512/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/myriad/), [Richmond](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011040512/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/parkinson/richmond/), [Phoenica](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011040512/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/preusstype/phoenica/), [Raldo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011040512/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/raldo-re/)  
4. Can't remember but I'm convinced this is something I've already seen. This /e rings me a bell.  
5. Reminds me of Doyald Young's work. Something between [Home Run](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011040512/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/doyald-young/home-run/) and [Eclat](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011040512/http:/www.fonts.com/font/image-club/eclat).  
6. [Democratica](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011040512/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/emigre/democratica-ot/)

Thanks for your help. but No.1 is not Hand Drawn, it is a font used in a design made by some Novice Designer.  
i repeat its not Hand Drawn plz help
don't suppose you have any other reference for the glazy image? (website, type of product... anything?). sometimes it helps. i go a little CSI on some of the submissions :)
